page.title: 11IBSTOCK COMMUNITY COLLEGE -1
page.content: Ibstock High School has been a community college since l963, as a result of the Director of Education's desire to open up the school's facilities to the community at large. It has a large catchment area, drawing people from Measham, Groby, Barlestone and Thringstone. In a year it runs 145 different classes, catering for the educational (e.g.'O' level French) and recreational (e.g. badminton) needs of the area. About 3,200 people use the college facilties each week. This includes classes, affiliated groups and local primary schools. Around 2,500 of them use the swimming pool which was opened in l976.
